title: FS: T206 Johnny Evers Portrait Piedmont SOLD
author: jabiloxi

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Johnny Evers Portrait Piedmont SOLD
posts.post_content:
I have the following Evers portrait for sale:

T206 Johhny Evers Portrait Piedmont vg-ex $Sold :)

This is a beautiful card with no creases or blemishes.  It measures to size but is miscut.  Anyways, a great card of the Hall of Fame shortstop and will be a great deal for any T206 collector.
